title: Knovation Sets High Standards for Digital Learning Content with Two Award Wins
text:
Personalized learning solution icurio honored with Tech & Learning Award of Excellence and Learning magazine Teachers’ Choice Award
CINCINNATI (PRWEB) October 22, 2015
The shift away from textbooks as the core instructional material has pushed K-12 schools and districts to rethink the way they develop and deliver content. The Tech & Learning Awards of Excellence and Learning Magazine Teachers’ Choice Awards recently recognized icurio from Knovation as an ideal tool for accessing and delivering relevant, professionally-evaluated, and standards-aligned online resources for learning.
More than ever, teachers look to their districts for help selecting, organizing and delivering relevant content to their students. While educators have access to an unprecedented amount of online resources, streamlining the evaluation, selection and delivery of digital content can be a challenge.
“Since 1999, Knovation has kept its promise to do something good for kids every day by making it incredibly easy to find, share and organize digital content for learning,” said Randy Wilhelm, Knovation CEO. “Winning industry awards from prestigious organizations such as Tech & Learning and Learning reaffirm that the work we do is recognized for making a difference in the lives of students and educators.”
Knovation’s curriculum experts select, evaluate, categorize and align the most rigorous and relevant digital content for learning according to a 127-point certification process. Advanced technology maintains Knovation’s collection of over 360,000 online resources to ensure they are current and safe.
icurio is one of the solutions teachers and students can use to find, organize and share online resources from Knovation’s collection. The comprehensive solution lets teachers customize search results according to educationally relevant criteria, as well as collect and organize resources according to each district’s curriculum structure and pacing guides. icurio can be used with the whole class, small groups or individual students.
Tech & Learning honored icurio in its 33rd annual Awards of Excellence program after experts in the field thoroughly reviewed the product. The 22nd annual Learning Magazine’s Teachers’ Choice Awards selects winners based upon two vigorous reviews from a panel of educators. The panel chose icurio as a winner among the ranks of the very best in classroom-tested, teacher-recommended products.
To learn more about Knovation’s dynamic collection of online resources, and award-winning solutions icurio and netTrekker, visit http://www.knovationlearning.com .
About Knovation
Since 1999, Knovation has delivered on the promise to do something good for kids, every day, by helping districts meet the needs of diverse K-12 learners in blended digital learning environments. Knovation makes it easy to find, manage, and use digital content for learning by professionally evaluating, standards aligning and continuously maintaining a collection of over 360,000 online resources covering all subjects and all grades. Knovation’s collection can be accessed through the company’s award-winning solutions ( netTrekker and icurio ) or through custom integration with several instructional or assessment platforms. For more information, please visit http://www.knovationlearning.com .
